channel.title: FETCH! with Ruff Ruffman . Podcast | PBS KIDS GO!
channel.description: Find out what really goes on behind the scenes on "Fetch! with Ruff Ruffman" in exclusive interviews with the top dog himself, Ruff Ruffman. FETCH! with Ruff Ruffman is the hilarious reality TV series for 6 to 10 year old kids that features real kids, real challenges and one really cool canine host.

item.title: FETCH! Ruff Needs YOU! | PBS KIDS GO!

item.title: FETCH! The Zombie Effect... Starting September 29th | PBS KIDS GO!

item.title: FETCH! Ruff's HOWLoween Podcast | PBS KIDS GO!
item.description: Ruff and his friends are getting ready for Halloween. But what manner of scariness will they encounter in Studio G's dark, spooky basement when they go down there for one last item? For more, go to http://www.pbskidsgo.org/fetch.

item.title: FETCH! Audition Podcast | PBS KIDS GO!
item.description: Ruff needs to spread the word--auditions for FETCH! are coming soon! But since he's just been fired, Ruff has to start going on auditions himself... item.title: FETCH! Holiday Podcast 2008 | PBS KIDS GO!
item.description: Ruff is feeling blue since he was fired as host of FETCH! with Ruff Ruffman. Murray convinces him to sing some holiday songs to cheer up. Can holiday cheer actually cheer up Ruff? Watch FETCH! with Ruff Ruffman on PBS KIDS GO! For more, visit http://www.pbskidsgo.org/fetch.

item.title: FETCH! Rock 'em, Sock 'em | PBS KIDS GO!
item.description: Ruff takes us "behind the scenes" for a look at how he comes up with the fabulous games for his show and Web site. item.title: FETCH! The What-Should-Ruff-Get-His-Grandma-for-Her-Birthday-Because-Her-Birthday's-Today-and-He-Forgot-to-Get-Her-Something Radio Show | PBS KIDS GO!
item.description: Ruff forgot to get Grandma Ruffman a birthday present, so he hosts his own radio talk show to ask for gift ideas. Ruff's cousin, Bluff, and his brother, Scruff, call the show and have some interesting birthday ideas. Watch FETCH! with Ruff Ruffman on PBS KIDS GO! For more, visit http://www.pbskidsgo.org/fetch
